Status icons used on this page:

- Proposed modules ðŸ†• - Modules that are proposed and/or being worked on but not published yet.
- Published modules ðŸŸ¢ & ðŸ‘€ - Available and Orphaned modules that are active and usable (with differences in their maintenance).
- Deprecated modules ðŸ”´ - Modules that reached the end of their lifecycle.
- All modules ðŸ“‡ - Including Published, Proposed and Deprecated ones.

See the [Module Lifecycle](/Azure-Verified-Modules/specs/shared/module-lifecycle/) page for more details.
